remarks: Define group addition function.  Usually we will use ` +g ` directly instead of ` +f ` , and they have the same behavior in most cases.  The main advantage of ` +f ` is that it is a guaranteed function ( ~ mndplusf ), while ` +g ` only has closure ( ~ mndcl ).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2015.)
statement:
df-ipf $p |- .if = ( g e. _V |-> ( x e. ( Base ` g ) , y e. ( Base ` g ) |-> ( x ( .i ` g ) y ) ) ) $.
$d g x y $.
